column4: When using WINE, is it better to install applications using their installers, or to copy files from another installation directly to the wine directory?
okay. Also, how do I add WINE apps to my Applications menu?
jordan_u Indyguyfreak: some of the ones I have installed haven't added or correctly added shortcuts to the menu
if they don't get added auotmagically, you can make a launcher script,... not on my ubuntu box atm, but you might try googling it
